Here are some popular audiobook platforms and services that offer a wide selection of titles, including many from the authors I mentioned earlier:

1. **Audible**: Amazon's audiobook platform offers an enormous selection of titles, including many bestsellers and new releases. They have a vast collection of books from Kristin Hannah, Taylor Jenkins Reid, and the similar authors I mentioned. Audible offers a free trial, and membership plans start at $14.95/month.
2. **Libro.fm**: Libro.fm is an audiobook platform that partners with independent bookstores to offer a wide selection of titles. They have a large collection of audiobooks from authors like Hannah, Reid, and others, and you can support local bookstores while listening. They offer a free trial, and membership plans start at $14.99/month.
3. **Scribd**: Scribd is a subscription-based service that offers access to a vast library of audiobooks, e-books, and documents. They have a large collection of titles from popular authors, including Hannah and Reid, and offer a free trial. Membership plans start at $8.99/month.
4. **Hoopla Digital**: Hoopla is a digital media platform that offers e-books, audiobooks, music, movies, and TV shows. They have a large collection of audiobooks from popular authors, including Hannah and Reid, and offer a free trial. Membership is free with a library card or student ID.
5. **OverDrive**: OverDrive is a digital library platform that allows you to borrow e-books and audiobooks from your local library or school. They have a large collection of titles from popular authors, including Hannah and Reid, and offer a free service with a library card or student ID.
6. **Google Play Books**: Google Play Books is a digital bookstore that offers a large selection of audiobooks, including many bestsellers and new releases. They have a wide selection of titles from authors like Hannah and Reid, and offer a free trial. Prices vary depending on the title.
7. **Audiobooks.com**: Audiobooks.com is an audiobook platform that offers a large selection of titles, including many bestsellers and new releases. They have a wide selection of titles from authors like Hannah and Reid, and offer a free trial. Membership plans start at $14.95/month.
8. **Kobo Audiobooks**: Kobo Audiobooks is a digital bookstore that offers a large selection of audiobooks, including many bestsellers and new releases. They have a wide selection of titles from authors like Hannah and Reid, and offer a free trial. Prices vary depending on the title.

These platforms offer a mix of subscription-based services, à la carte purchasing, and free trials, so you can choose the one that best fits your listening habits and budget. Happy listening!
